name: DRAGON VS HUMANS
description:
In this game you’re a dragon and what do you want as dragon? Gold of course! Luckily it's easy to get gold... or is it? You need to destroy houses to get gold from the humans but watch out they will fight back!

(try to survive and get points)

How to play:

It’s pretty easy to play. You only need your mouse to move and right mouse button to fire. 

Credits:

Ewoud van de Werf: Programming & Level Design
BramTeard Dijkstra: 3D Art
Lars Oost: 3D Art
Leon Oost: Concepter & UI Art
